alert.note: Alert for Albemarle; Augusta; Greene; Madison; Nelson; Page; Rockingham; Shenandoah (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 08 at 12:53PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of central Virginia, northwest Virginia and western Virginia, including the following areas: in central Virginia, Albemarle, Central Virginia Blue Ridge, Greene and Nelson. In northwest Virginia, Madison, Northern Virginia Blue Ridge, Page and Shenandoah. In western Virginia, Augusta and Rockingham. * WHEN...Through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Showers are likely with scattered thunderstorms. Localized rainfall amounts around 1 to 3 inches are possible, and most of that may fall within a one to two hour period. Heavy amounts of rain in a short period of time may cause rapid rises in streams and creeks as well as the potential for flash flooding in urban areas. - Please visit http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood for information on flood safety.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Albemarle; Augusta; Greene; Madison; Nelson; Page; Rockingham; Shenandoah
